description: A Marine branch in the East Blue commanded by Nelson Royale. This branch became corrupted under Nelson's leadership, pursuing Apis and Ryu for personal gain rather than justice.

goals.description: Nelson Royale seeks to capture the dragon to obtain its bones (Dragonite) which he believes grants immortality.
Nelson wants to capture Apis because she knows Ryu's location through her Hiso Hiso no Mi powers.

keyMoments.description: The 8th Branch continues its pursuit of the Straw Hats and Apis to Warship Island.
keyMoments.significance: Maintains the threat and sets up future confrontations.

notes: This is an anime-only organization that appears only in the Warship Island filler arc. The rank 'Teitoku' that Nelson holds is unofficial and doesn't exist in canon Marine ranks.
